file_content.text: Medic's on the way. One more beating from Gambo would have finished me.
Don't know what you said, but I almost died of shock when Gambo turned himself in.
Command might grumble about excessive force, but it's not my fault he picked a fight with someone he couldn't beat.
We're not taking any chances. There's a whole squad escorting him back to headquarters.
I should call a medic before I pass out. Thanks for the help.
Gambo's a threat we can't tolerate. He's got to be stopped.
Wait. I'm too dizzy to get a head count, but I know you outnumber me.
It's an honor, Master Jedi. I apologize in advance if I throw up on you.
Stop there, uh, officer? I can't make out your rank, but I think you can help.
Halt, citizen. I'm seeing double, but you both look like you can handle yourself.
Officer Anstiss. Nice to... ouch... meet you. Apparently I've got enemies back at HQ.
Got the unenviable task of arresting Gambo--Black Sun enforcer with a string of murders to his name.
I've gone inside the Dealer's Den half a dozen times to confront him, and he's beaten me within a centimeter of my life each time.
Maybe I should talk to Gambo.
He'd listen to a Jedi.
A Jedi might at least make him think twice, if that's a serious offer.
Perhaps you should try talking to Gambo instead.
You don't have to fight.
Gambo doesn't talk, except with his fists.
If an attack fails, you don't keep using it.
You need some strategy.
Strategy for security officers is pretty much limited to shock sticks and neural bands.
He can't beat blaster fire.
Be more direct.
The Republic doesn't kill its criminals, even if they're asking for it.
You don't look so good.
My head's pounding and you're covered in spots. I've been better.
Your problem, not mine.
Gambo's vicious, and he's been terrorizing this sector for months. As long as he's at-large, the public's not safe.
I'd call for backup, but frankly, Gambo could tear through that whole cantina if he had a mind to.
He needs to be talked down or knocked out if I'm going to arrest him. I'm no match, but you might have a shot.
I'll go talk to Gambo. You should get to a medcenter.
Don't worry about it.
I won't leave my post. I can't take Gambo, but I can keep tabs on him.
I like a challenge.
No one sees Gambo without going through Zooki, his lookout.
If you're lucky, Gambo might give you a few words before he starts swinging. Use them wisely.
Toughen up. [Refuse quest]
Right then, guess I'm going back in. As soon as the room stops spinning.
Sorry, can't help you. I'm out of commission until I can see straight.
Gambo's passed out inside. You should arrest him before he wakes up.
